titleStmt.title: The epitaph of Sir Phillip Sidney Knight, lately Lord Gouernour of Floshing
titleStmt.author: Churchyard, Thomas, 1520?-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: By George Robinson for Thomas Cadman, and are to be sold at his shop at the greate north-doore of S. Paules Church, at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Running title, which is split and reversed recto to verso, reads: An epitaph of the worthie Sir Phillip Sidney.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
